Description: Surrogate primary key for project member assignment
Notes: Preferred over composite PK for flexibility

Description: Project to which the person is assigned
Role the person has on the project
Timestamp when the person was assigned to the project
Timestamp when the person was released from the project

Constraints: CHECK (is_active = true OR released_at IS NOT NULL)
Description: Whether the assignment is currently active
Notes: Supports partial unique index on active assignments
